nodes.description: 周四印度公民 Kulbhashan Yadav 提交认罪及减刑请求
nodes.support_text: On Thursday, Kulbhashan Yadav, an Indian national who has been convicted and sentenced to death by a military court for funding and planning attacks in Balochistan for the Indian spy agency RAW, submitted a confession and mercy petition to Pakistan’s army chief, the Pakistani military said.

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦成立特别安全部队（SSD）保障中巴经济走廊
nodes.support_text: Pakistan has established a Special Security Division comprising 15,000 troops to secure the CPEC corridor and projects associated with it.

nodes.description: 2022年8月奎达警察学院遭自杀式袭击致60人死亡
nodes.support_text: In August last year, at least 74 people were killed in a suicide attack on the city’s Civil Hospital, while another 60 were killed in an attack on a police academy two months later.

nodes.description: 2023年2月奎达 Saryab 桥炸弹袭击致13人受伤
nodes.support_text: In February, two bomb disposal squad members were killed and 11 others wounded in an explosion under Quetta’s Saryab bridge, local media reported.

nodes.description: 周五早晨奎达省警察总部附近发生自杀式爆炸致12死14伤
nodes.support_text: Suicide attack near provincial police chief’s office kills at least 12 people and wounds 14 others... The explosion on Friday morning struck a police checkpoint near a complex that is housing the Balochistan police chief’s office...

nodes.description: Jamaat-ur-Ahrar 宣布对爆炸袭击负责
nodes.support_text: Jamaat-ur-Ahrar, a faction of the Pakistan Taliban, has claimed responsibility for the attack in a statement sent out its spokesperson Asad Mansoor.

nodes.description: Al Jazeera 报道指出 IG 办公室可能是袭击目标
nodes.support_text: Al Jazeera’s Kamal Hyder, reporting from Islamabad, said the Inspector General’s office was the likely target of the attack.

nodes.description: 奎达省多次遭 Baloch 分离主义武装及极端组织袭击
nodes.support_text: Quetta, the provincial capital of Balochistan province, has seen frequent attacks targeting government buildings and security forces, as well as civilians.
Earlier this month, two Chinese citizens were kidnapped and killed in the province.
Earlier this month, two Chinese citizens were kidnapped and killed in the province.

nodes.description: 当局指控印度制造不稳定
nodes.support_text: 当局指控印度制造不稳定

edges.support_text: Earlier this month, two Chinese citizens were kidnapped and killed in the province. Pakistan has established a Special Security Division comprising 15,000 troops to secure the CPEC corridor and projects associated with it.
In August last year, at least 74 people were killed in a suicide attack on the city’s Civil Hospital, while another 60 were killed in an attack on a police academy two months later.
Quetta, the provincial capital of Balochistan province, has seen frequent attacks targeting government buildings and security forces, as well as civilians.
Jamaat-ur-Ahrar, a faction of the Pakistan Taliban, has claimed responsibility for the attack in a statement sent out its spokesperson Asad Mansoor.
Al Jazeera’s Kamal Hyder, reporting from Islamabad, said the Inspector General’s office was the likely target of the attack.
Quetta, the provincial capital of Balochistan province, has seen frequent attacks targeting government buildings and security forces, as well as civilians.

Earlier this month, two Chinese citizens were kidnapped and killed in the province. Pakistan has established a Special Security Division comprising 15,000 troops to secure the CPEC corridor and projects associated with it.
Kidnap occurred before killing as per the temporal_order=2.
指控发生在定罪事件之前
